about_the_game:
Embark on an electrifying journey through the unique world of "Waifu Force," a fun and energetic 2D shooter game that blends the best of old-school arcade action with anime-inspired visuals. Battle your way through waves of enemies and powerful bosses, each with their unique personalities and playstyles, from the commanding Space Captain, the ethereal Alien Slime Girl, all the way to the vengeful rough and tough hockey player. Unleash powerful weapons and upgrades as you face off against eleven individual bosses, each of whom bring special weapons and techniques to do battle with you! With high-energy music, intense gameplay, and a truly enjoyable narrative, "Waifu Force" is sure to bring you an enjoyable and unique experience.

Indulge in the delightfully provocative and NSFW elements of "Waifu Force," where unexpected encounters and alluring characters add a captivating twist to an already high-energy game!

Will you rise to the challenge? The choice is yours, brave pilot!

This is a DEMO version of the game. Many features/levels that are in the final version of the game are not available in the demo version.

content_descriptors.notes:
OPTIONAL NUDITY:
If enabled, this game can feature characters that progressively wear fewer and fewer clothes, until nude. 
Suggestive language & profanity.
Suggestive themes.
Some sexualized actions depicted, but all are with solo characters.
